reviews.review: Если не играть то игра нормальная

What the Hell has happened to this game??
I played this back in the day when it first went live and also played the source versions etc but this is now a shadow of its former self.
matchmaking is wild, im silver 2 and matchmake with global
Is like shit, i don't recomandet becaus hackers and is free

game is good. im just bad
Love hate relationship. I love to hate it.
To addictive, dont open any case... you will not get any good skins. I tried its a big shame what cs Go does its a robery what they do with case opening... buy skins from the comunity market
çok gözel bir oyun fakat hileler at koşturuyor

Karşı takımda toxic olursa oyununuz sizin için çok berbat bir durum oluyor. İyi oynadığınızda direkt report yiyorsunuz ve güven faktörünüz yerlerde geziyor sonra hileler sizin takımınıza ve karşı takıma denk geliyor ve rankınız siliniyor. Allah sabır versin.

Retarded Game.ITs funny to play BUT.....I got kicked,i am banned.I deal damage to my dumb teammates inadvertently and i got banned.I dont find a point.I am legit player and i have ban for a week AGAIN.Just fuck this brainless game!

Really boring with wrong team mates, suicide mission. 
It's a team building game, really fun with people in your skill group, and higher level of understanding.
